mapper.sql: select id, sn, model, longitude, latitude, status, uid, phone, user_info_id, user_name, store_id, model_id, battery_sn, create_time, update_time, del_flag, tenant_id,lock_type from t_electricity_car
mapper.select: SELECT ec.id AS carId, ec.sn AS carSn, ec.store_id AS storeId, s.`name` AS storeName, s.`longitude` AS longitude, s.`latitude` AS latitude FROM t_electricity_car ec JOIN t_store s ON ec.store_id = s.id WHERE ec.id = #{carId} AND ec.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
mapper.update: update t_electricity_car set status=#{status}, uid=#{uid}, phone=#{phone}, user_info_id=#{userInfoId}, user_name=#{userName}, update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id}
